summary: This is a mod that changes the enchantments to something more suitable on the Nightingale armour.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the enchantments that comes to benefit for Archers and Close-up Assassins.

What made me start making this mod, was that I found it ridiculous that a armour you have to equir like this doesn\'t have Archery perks (Which is a bit ironic considering you get the Nightingale Bow later in the story).

I have relocated a few enchantments and added some, that will benefit any type of assassin (Archer, Close-up/Dagger and Arcane/Illusion).

I hope you enjoy the mod as much as i do. Pictures will be up soon, I just have to find the right software to take the pictures first:)

And a little shout-out to the Nightingale Prime HD mod by AncientVampire, that fits well to this mod:)
author: Ole-HenrikNorway
